title: Metal Gear Music Collection
titles_alternative: Includes music from Metal Gear (MSX2), Metal Gear (NES), Snake's Revenge (NES), Metal Gear 2 - Solid Snake (MSX2), Metal Gear - Ghost Babel (GBC)
